About
==========================

Column {data-width = 200}
-------------------------

**Penguins** 

The **penguins** dataset contains information on the size measurements of adult penguins by Palmer Station, Antarctica. It contains information on three species (Adelie, Gentoo, and Chinstrap) from three islands in the Palmer Archipelago (Biscoe, Dream, Torgersen).

Column {data-width = 200}
-------------------------

```{r, echo = FALSE}
include_graphics("penguin.jpg")
```

Interactive
==========================

### Penguin Body Mass and Bill Length by Species

```{r, echo = FALSE}
penguins <- palmerpenguins::penguins
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
inputPanel(
  radioButtons("radio", label = h3("Penguin Species"),
    choices = list("Adelie" = "Adelie", "Gentoo" = "Gentoo", "Chinstrap" = "Chinstrap"), 
    selected = "Adelie"),
)
renderPlot({
  penguins |>
    filter(species == input$radio) |>
    ggplot(aes(x = body_mass_g, y = bill_length_mm)) + 
      geom_point()
})

```
